# CryptoHelper class

Static class which contains methods for works with encrypt/decrypt.

```csharp
public static class CryptoHelper
```

## Public Members

| name | description |
| --- | --- |
| static [Decrypt](CryptoHelper/Decrypt.md)(…) | Decrypts specified ciphertext using Rijndael symmetric key algorithm. |
| static [Encrypt](CryptoHelper/Encrypt.md)(…) | Encrypts specified plaintext using Rijndael symmetric key algorithm and returns a base64-encoded result. |
